sidebar.title: DNS Service Installation Overview
sidebar.para: The [[[kw-hos]]] DNS Service supports several different backends for domain name service. The choice of backend must be included in the deployment model before the [[[kw-hos]]] install is completed.

warning.para: By default any user in the project is allowed to manage a DNS domain. This can be changed by updating the Policy.json file for Designate.

sidebar.para: The backends that are available within the DNS Service are separated into two categories, self-contained and external.

row.entry: All components necessary will be installed and configured as part of the [[[kw-hos]]] install.
POCs and customers who wish to keep cloud and traditional DNS separated.
The authoritative DNS server itself is external to [[[kw-hos]]]. Management and configuration is out of scope for the lifecycle manager but remains the responsibility of the customer.
Customers who wish to integrate with their existing DNS infrastructure.
